action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Mechanical Engineering
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Fifteen years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Bachelor
OTHER-SKILLS: Project management
AVAILABILITY: Anytime next month

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No.

ANSWER: No, they have not been informed yet.

RECRUITER: What is your educational background?

ANSWER: I have a Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering.

RECRUITER: How much industry experience do you have?

ANSWER: I have fifteen years of industry experience.

RECRUITER: What other skills do you have?
no

Answer is correct.

ASIDE: I have a lot of experience in this field.

ASIDE: In my previous roles, I have successfully managed and completed several large-scale mechanical engineering projects on time and within budget. I have also developed and implemented new processes that improved efficiency and reduced costs. Additionally, I have mentored
